title: [Bug report] Integration libreoffice writer and Zotero 7 makes zotero crash - Zotero Forums
text:
[Bug report] Integration libreoffice writer and Zotero 7 makes zotero crash
Hi!
ID report: 1371703748
Expected behaviour: having zotero 7 and libreoffice with the integration plugin
1. Open Zotero.
2. Open libreroffice.
3. Click "add citation" (or any other zotero button).
4. Zotero crashes.
I catched this error in the terminal: /app/bin/zotero: línea 20: 5 Violación de segmento (`core' generado) "$CALLDIR/zotero-bin" -app "$CALLDIR/app/application.ini" "$@"
Both apps are flatpaks in Linux OS. Also tried with flatpak zotero + regular libreoffice. Same result. Libreoffice version: 24.8.3.2
Thank you in advance
